prompts: What is the process for applying to your university?
Can you explain how to enroll in your university?
What steps do I need to follow to apply to your university?
How can I get admitted to your university?
What are the admission criteria for your university?
Could you provide information on how to gain admission to your university?
What is the procedure for applying to your university?
Can you walk me through the process of getting into your university?
What are the requirements for admission to your university?
Could you outline the application process for your university?
responses:
Following are the steps to apply at K.J Somaiya College of Engineering:
 1.Candidates (pursuing HSC 2023 /completed HSC in 2022 or before) willing to pursue B. Tech degree can submit the online preadmission form available on college website (admissions.somaiya.edu) with payment of non-refundable/ non-transferable application fees Rs. 2000/-
 2. Admission process will be carried out in different phases and rounds based on different entrance examinations: Phases: 1- SAT 2022/2023)/ 2-JEE Main Session (Jan-Feb 2023)/ 3-JEE Main Session-2 (April 2023)/ 4 -PERA-CET 2023/5- MHT-CET 2023/6-CUET 2023. Visit the important dates section on the college website for a schedule of phases/rounds.
 3. Candidates can apply any one or more than one phases/rounds within the same pre-application (selecting appropriate options in your dashboard) based entrance examinations using the login credentials (registered email and password).
 4. A provisional seat offered or not offered (based on the merit, programme preference and availability of seats taken together) will be communicated via registered email.
For more details, visit: https://kjsce.somaiya.edu/en/admission/

responses: The training and placement cell provides placement services to students through campus interviews.Many multinational and well- known Indian conglomerates regularly visit KJSCE for campus placement every year. Training and placement cell motivates and prepares the students for the interviews and prospective workplaces. To know more about this, visit: https://kjsce.somaiya.edu/en/placement/overview

KJSCE's Training and Placement Cell is committed to providing our students with the best opportunities for employment. Our cell regularly organizes campus interviews with multinational corporations and top Indian conglomerates, giving our students the chance to shine. We also provide our students with the necessary training and guidance to prepare them for the interview process and their future workplaces. For more information on our placement services, please visit our website at https://kjsce.somaiya.edu/en/placement/overview.

At KJSCE, we believe that our students deserve the best opportunities for employment. That's why our Training and Placement Cell works tirelessly to bring in top companies for campus placement every year. With a focus on motivation and preparation, we aim to equip our students with the skills they need to excel in the job market. For more information on our placement services, please visit our website at https://kjsce.somaiya.edu/en/placement/overview.
